Professional Profile

Systems Engineering student and self-taught programmer with knowledge in Python, C++, basic web development, and technical support. Experience in customer service and sales strengthened communication, problem-solving, and analytical skills. Academically interested in the theoretical study of artificial intelligence, its structure and general operation. Highly responsible, adaptable, and committed to continuous learning.
